daten module¶

class daten.DataClass¶

Bases: object

Data model containing data from user inputs and simulation parameter.

Variables

  • self.car_amount – Amount of cars arrinving per week in the simulation instance.

  • self.power_cp – Power of the charging points.

  • self.amount_cp – Number of charging points for the simulation instance.

  • self.control – Control strategy for the simulation strategy.

  • self.co2_scenario – CO2 scenario considered in the simulation instance.

  • self.co2_scenario – Storage capacity in kWh considered in the simulation instance.

  • self.storage_capacity – Capacity of the battery from the charging infrastructure.

  • self.total_simulation_time – Amount of time steps in the simulation.

  • self.dis_ev_arr – Distribution of the vehicle arrival as per input file.

  • self.dis_year – Total amount of car arrivals over simulation time.

  • self.dis_soc – Distribution of the SOC at arrival times of the vehicles.

  • self.dis_battery_size – Distribution of the battery sizes for the vehicles.

  • self.dis_user_type – Distribution of the user types resulting in different pariking times.

get_time_series_data()¶

Read time series data from input files.

daten.read_user_assumptions()¶

Read yaml file containing the data specified by the user.

Returns

User input data.

Return type

dict
